entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
